Issue.summary: gossip.service test failed in the unit-tests, Channel connection failed.
Issue.description: ERRO 08b Tried joining channel A but our org( OrgMSP0 ), isn't among the orgs of the channel: Org0 , aborting._+ *Intermittent:* Yes *Branch:* release-1.4 *Platform:* s390x *Error Snippet:* {code:java} 22:01:56 /w/workspace/fabric-unit-test-daily-release-1.4-s390x/gopath/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric/vendor/google.golang.org/grpc/int--- FAIL: TestLeaderYield (117.03s)22:01:56 integration_test.go:156: p0 started its delivery service*22:01:56* integration_test.go:161: p0 stopped its delivery service*22:01:56* integration_test.go:171: p1 hasn't taken over leadership within 1m0s: -1*22:01:56* 2019-01-10 22:01:07.362 EST gossip.service updateAnchors -> ERRO 08b Tried joining channel A but our org( OrgMSP0 ), isn't among the orgs of the channel: Org0 , aborting.{code} *Build Logs:* https://logs.hyperledger.org/production/vex-yul-hyp-jenkins-3/fabric-unit-test-daily-release-1.4-s390x/17/ >
